Articles.Content: If a person would like to talk to someone in charge via PM about the ridiculously stupid amount of moderation(moving threads to dead sub forums) on the KSP general forum who would that person be?

Hi -RanZ- ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

General Discussion is not the place for every single thread any member thinks to post, this is why sub-forums exist, and threads will be moved to more appropriate forums as and when necessary.

And rather than being dead forums, they are very much alive and members are encouraged to view and post to all the sub-forums the KSP forums offer.

The "ridiculously stupid amount of moderation" is standard procedure and will continue.

If you have an issue with this you can contact KasperVld with your concerns.

Closing thread.
Also, what will make those sub-forums not-dead? Posting stuff in them, or moving stuff to them, where appropriate.
